message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $900000. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item at a discounted price, and I'm confident you'll find it worthwhile.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $850000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to this amount?

I understand you're looking to keep your investment within $850000, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $900000? This would allow me to secure the product while keeping my investment within my desired range.
